code:
stateDiagram-v2
  [*] --> Idle

  Idle --> Hosting: startHosting()
  Idle --> Browsing: startBrowsing()

  Hosting --> Idle: stop()
  Browsing --> Idle: stop()

  Hosting --> Hosting: send() / broadcast
  Browsing --> Browsing: send() / to host

  note right of Idle
    events() returns an AsyncStream
    of MultipeerEvent values
  end note
repo_description: A local-first, democratic jukebox for road trips: hosts control playback while guests vote and shape the queue in real time.
